Author: pandaanu73#7907
Content: I want to raise a question ? I'm running smart chain on a single node if i want to use double node do i need to stop the node and run it once again and in place of localhost i need to use the 2nd node ip is it correct

Author: phm87#7395
Content: you don't need to stop the first one, just launch a second one but with -addnode=<ip of the first node>

Content: there should be a KMD documentation on this

Author: phm87#7395
Content: I've never launched an assetchain/smartchain myself alone ... so I don't know all details of the 2 nodes setup to launch a new one. I'm guessing that (after choosing some ac_param) we need to open the p2p port on each machine and add the ip in addnode for both -addnode=<IP 1> -addnode=<IP 2>, check that each machine can ping the other one through that open port, launch the 2 nodes then mine the first 160 blocks only on one node then try to mine on both nodes.
